info.title: HungryScan API
info.description:
### Technologies used:
- Spring Boot 3.x.x
- Spring Security 6.x.x
- Java 21
- Hibernate Core
- Hibernate Validator
- Jakarta Persistence API
- MySQL
- Lombok
- Redis 7.2.5
- Embedded Redis 0.7.3
- Embedded H2
- Gson 2.11.0
- JJWT 0.12.6
- ZXing Core 3.5.3
- ZXing Java SE 3.5.3
- MapStruct 1.6.3
- JUnit 5
- Mockito
info.summary: A central REST server supporting a QR system designed for restaurants, which makes it easy for customers to access an interactive menu. This API is still in development, it is not available for requests yet.
